resources.string: Sorry, the app cannot be applied to your phone because the light sensor on your phone was not found…
Sorry, the phone does not have or you have not granted Root permissions and the app cannot run as expected…
Night threshold must be less than Day threshold!

string-array.name: hint_tips_content
string-array.item: \"Current light\" get from your phone\'s light sensor, refer to it to set your custom threshold.
If you don\'t wish to change the current threshold setting, leave it blank and submit.
Sensor updates every 0.2s. It means you set the \"Delay time\" to 5, Mode will switch 5*0.2=1s after threshold is reached.

resources.string: All thresholds must be positive and below MAX_INT
